org.bouncycastle.tls

Class CombinedHash

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bouncycastle.tls.CombinedHash
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TlsHash

    public class CombinedHash
extends java.lang.Object
implements TlsHash
    A combined hash, which implements md5(m) || sha1(m).
